itemDescription: Scottish rugby union footballer and coach

wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Kelly (born 2 June 1982) is a Scottish rugby union coach who coaches Valley RFC in Hong Kong. He previously played for Edinburgh Rugby in the Pro14. He played at Hooker.

response: * Andrew Kelly - former Edinburgh Rugby player. Scotland A. international.
* Andrew Kelly (rugby union, born 1981), Scottish rugby union player for Glasgow Warriors
